content:
/>
X.ii.3.B.2.e
.
Evidence Received Supporting the Proposed Adverse Action
If the beneficiary sends documentary evidence that supports the proposed adverse action
make the adjustment, and
send the beneficiary a final decision notice of the implemented adverse action.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B - Adverse Action Proposal Period
citation: Part X, Subpart ii, Chapter 3, Section B
